## Experience


{{< fa solid person-chalkboard size=lg >}} &nbsp; **Chemnitz University of Technology** - Germany
<span style="float:right;">2011 - now</span>

$\rightarrow$ Researcher / lecturer in the faculty of Computer science, AI lab of [Fred Hamker](https://www.tu-chemnitz.de/informatik/KI).

* Research: 
    * Neuroinformatics: neurosimulator [ANNarchy](https://github.com/ANNarchy/ANNarchy).
    * Deep reinforcement learning.
    * Reservoir computing.
    * Computational neuroscience: basal ganglia, dopamine, hippocampus.
* Teaching: 
    * Neurocomputing / Machine Learning
    * Deep Reinforcement Learning
    * Computer Vision
    * Introduction to AI.
* Erasmus+ departmental coordinator.
